meanings.definition: The area near or surrounding a particular place.
meanings.sent1: I live in the vicinity of the park.
meanings.sent2: The store is located in the vicinity of the school.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel in the vicinity of the tree seemed lost.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed in the vicinity of the empty room.
meanings.sent5: The scent of fresh flowers filled the vicinity with a sweet fragrance.

meanings.definition: The state of being near or in the area around a particular place.
meanings.sent1: We enjoy the safety of our vicinity.
meanings.sent2: The children played happily in the vicinity of their homes.
meanings.sent3: The cat's curiosity led it to explore the vicinity of the garden.
meanings.sent4: His kindness created a warm atmosphere in the vicinity of the office.
meanings.sent5: The darkness in the vicinity made it hard to see anything clearly.
